Subject: Re: Fighting at Maxi City

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

As Megatron turned his head to follow the ever moving Prowl, so did the
eye that was the target, as the Ninja Star grazed off the back of his
head, leaving a disturbing metal on metal noise. The kick caught him in
the midsection, as he doubled over. He stayed for a brief second,
motionless, until he began to quiver with laughter. "I am power." He
leaned back, and then swung both of his arms forward, clasping them
together to make a double ax handle, aiming for Prowl's large
midsection.
